user_preferences.team: Full team (4-6 people) with photos, names, roles, and bios
user_preferences.stats: Automation metrics: hours saved, tasks automated, efficiency gains

user_stories.title: Define CompanyStory requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect agent to define the CompanyStory component requirements

user_stories.title: Define Stats requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect agent to define the Stats component requirements with automation metrics
acceptance_criteria: Define 4 automation-focused metrics (hours saved, tasks automated, efficiency %, clients served)
Define responsive grid layout (2x2 mobile, 1x4 desktop)

user_stories.title: Define Values requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect agent to define 4-6 core values for Kohelet
acceptance_criteria: Research Kohelet brand positioning (B2B automation, AI agents)
Define 4-6 core values (e.g., Innovation, Efficiency, Partnership, Excellence)
Specify value card layout with icons
Define responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 cols tablet, 3 cols desktop)

user_stories.title: Define Team requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect agent to define Team component with 4-6 members
acceptance_criteria: Define team member data structure (photo, name, role, bio, social links)
Define card layout with hover effects
Document image placeholder approach (initials or generic avatar)

user_stories.title: Define AboutCTA requirements
user_stories.description: Use prd-architect agent to define the AboutCTA component
acceptance_criteria: Specify primary button (Schedule Consultation) and secondary button (Contact Us)

user_stories.title: Implement CompanyStory component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer agent to implement the CompanyStory component

user_stories.title: Implement Stats component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer agent to implement the Stats component with counter animations
acceptance_criteria: Implements 4 stat cards with GSAP counter animations

user_stories.title: Implement Values component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer agent to implement the Values grid component
acceptance_criteria: Implements value cards with Lucide icons
Hover effects on cards (scale, border color)

user_stories.title: Implement Team component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer agent to implement the Team cards component
acceptance_criteria: Implements team member cards with avatar, name, role, bio
Avatar uses initials or placeholder image

user_stories.title: Implement AboutCTA component
user_stories.description: Use ui-designer agent to implement the AboutCTA section
acceptance_criteria: Implements headline, subtext, and two buttons
Primary button links to /contact or opens calendar
Secondary button links to contact page

user_stories.title: Write CompanyStory copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter agent to write English and Hebrew copy for CompanyStory
acceptance_criteria: Write company narrative (2-3 paragraphs, en + he)
Copy aligns with Kohelet brand voice (expert, results-oriented)

user_stories.title: Write Stats labels
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter agent to write stat labels and section copy
acceptance_criteria: Write 4 stat labels (hours saved, tasks automated, efficiency %, clients served)

user_stories.title: Write Values copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter agent to write value names and descriptions
acceptance_criteria: Write short description for each value (1-2 sentences, en + he)
Values reflect Kohelet's brand (innovation, efficiency, partnership)

user_stories.title: Write Team bios
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter agent to write team member bios
acceptance_criteria: Write 4-6 team member names and roles
Write short bio for each (2-3 sentences, en + he)

user_stories.title: Write AboutCTA copy
user_stories.description: Use kohelet-copywriter agent to write CTA headline and button text

user_stories.title: Update translation files
user_stories.description: Add all about page translations to en.json and he.json
acceptance_criteria: All translation keys from COPY tasks are included

user_stories.title: Update barrel exports and verify page
user_stories.description: Update index.ts exports and verify page renders
acceptance_criteria: Page renders without errors in dev server

user_stories.title: Run build verification
user_stories.description: Run pnpm build and ensure no errors

implementation_order: Phase 1: PRD Definition (PRD-01 through PRD-05) - Use prd-architect agent
Phase 2: UI Implementation (UI-01 through UI-05) - Use ui-designer agent
Phase 3: Copywriting (COPY-01 through COPY-05) - Use kohelet-copywriter agent
Phase 4: Integration (INT-01 through INT-03) - Direct execution
